law.catch_line: Quarterly review of recommended confinement sanctions.
law.text: The probation and parole district supervisor shall review confinement sanctions recommended by probation and parole officers on a quarterly basis to assess any disparities that may exist among officers, evaluate the effectiveness of the sanction as measured by the supervised individualsâ€™ subsequent conduct, and monitor the impact on the departmentâ€™s number and type of revocations for violations of the conditions of supervision.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.63, effective June 8, 2011.
